about_the_game:
ABOUT
"Escape from HAON ISLAND" is a first-person 3D platformer with unique controls
- where you find yourself on an island with happy inhabitants and try to escape.

STORY
A strange voice is telling you, to escape. Afterward, you land in a crater of a mysterious Island.
You soon encounter its happy inhabitants who are very friendly and positive.
On your journey, you eliminate weird creatures by jumping onto them, while some others should better be avoided.
By exploring you solve problems, master your jumping skill and get to know more about the island.
Eventually you figure out what this whole place is about, why you are there and how you can escape.

GAMEPLAY
"Escape from HAON ISLAND" is a small, simple, story driven 3D indie platformer for the PC.
You play in the first-person perspective and move around by jumping and running.
The key gameplay feature is to master the controls to get skilled enough to solve the jumping passages.
Simple, but not easy.
You can play with a keyboard & mouse or a game pad.
Furthermore, you can adjust the sensitivity of the camera's movement speed to your liking.
There are seven different levels. You can find a lot of collectibles in most of them.
You only have one life point; if you get hit, the level will restart.
There is no option to save, only checkpoints after each level.
Thus, after you successfully finish a level, you might be able to find a shortcut.

The game has no violence or rough, inappropriate language.
